item.title: How to make npcs move around
item.dc:creator: @santaguy santaguy
item.description:
@santaguy wrote:

use this
spawn = NPCIDHERE STANDON(xcoord) STANDON(ycoord) Height Rangex1 Rangey1 Rangex2 Rangey2 Walktype NPCNAME

the range(xcoord) let them walk on a other coord
the range(ycoord) let them walk on a other coord

somting like
1111 4444 5555 6666
1111 position 4444 position 5555 walk to position X 6666 walk to position Y hope ur understand

Read full topic
item.source: How to make npcs move around

item.title: How to make npcs move around
item.dc:creator: @santaguy santaguy
item.description:
@santaguy wrote:

  1. Make npc walk Open autospawm
    U should see this:

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption spawn = 2026 3551 9694 0 0 0 0 0 2 Dharok

now add ur own npcWalk

spawn = NPCIDHERE	STANDON(xcoord)	STANDON(ycoord)	Height	Rangex1	Rangey1	Rangex2 Rangey2	Walktype 	NPCNAME

Read full topic
